website_summaries.verdict: Ideal everyday women's Blundstone boot. Features weather-proof leather that's 2.5mm thick.
pros: Anatomical design with removable Cambrelle comfort footbed
Insert wicks moisture away, Shock Prevention System reduces shock by 33%
Dual density outsole for softer walk
cons: Best to move up a half-size as their sizing is small

customer_reviews.title: In-between sizes- size up!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 8.5 but I sized up to a 9, the 8 is a little too tight and at least with the 9 I have the option of wearing thick socks in the winter. Most of the extra room is in the toe box, they are pretty fitted and snug around the ankle area. I read one review before purchasing where someone claimed these were fakes but the ones I received came in a branded box so I'm pretty sure these are legit. They are definitely very comfy and the soles feel nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Not what you're used to!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the awesome Australian made work-horses that made Blundstones such an awesome brand, these are the contract made in whatever country reboots that are going to drive the name into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Recommend -- but do your homework prior to purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Blundstones since they were made in Tasmania -- and (to my recollection) the Tasmanian boots had all the same issues as the Vietnamese made boots. For under $100.00, I think you can easily get $100.00 worth of value/wear out of them. In my experience, if you need a wide size, move up a half size. For reference, I wear a wide in Eastland, Redwing, and Bass and I wear a 9 in Brooks, Asics, and Sperry. I ordered a 9.5 (American) in these Blunnies and they fit great -- except that I get some pain on the top bone of my foot after a long day of wear. They have not stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is like it use to be
customer_reviews.text: Blundstone has been a staple rough footware company for a very long time. Lot's of people complain about the quality and how it use to be, i got news for you. Nothing is like it use to be. Still a very good shoe that will last you 5+ years before you need to get another pair. I use them and my kids use them for around town or all our adventures. Bottom line, get a pair use and abuse them buy a now pair in 5years.
customer_reviews.author: WolfDad

customer_reviews.title: They need to look good, feel good
customer_reviews.text: As a firefighter/AEMT, I'm in these boots for 24 hours a day, 10 shifts a month. They need to look good, feel good, and be durable. Ive had these boots for only 5.5 months and they look WAY older. I expected more longevity out of these given the price. Probably would not purchase these again. They do look great and feel comfortable, though. These would be fantastic for casual/fashion wear, but just don't think they're made to work.
customer_reviews.author: Trainer CB

customer_reviews.title: Will need some serious breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted a pair if these since my last pair wore our many years ago (after 5 years of steady use) I'm sure I'll enjoy my new ones more once Im able to break them in. The leather is quite stiff when new. A bit difficult to get my wide foot with a high instep into the boots, but that seems to be the case with most boots my size lately. Im told that will get easier after some breaking in . Once I get then on they fit quite well, with some wiggle room in the toe area. A but snug across my high instep, but that will listen up with some break in, as well.
customer_reviews.author: One Eyed Jack

customer_reviews.title: Boots so sick, I can't breathe! 15/10 🌟
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best fitting Chelsea boots I've ever worn in my life. Great all purpose boots! I work in both outdoor & in swanky indoor settings & these boots allow me to look slick & sick but also, offer sturdy protection & rugged grip at the same time. Durable & above all pretty water resistant, I've put it through 4 inch snow blizzards, lots of rain puddles, mud, & city streets & so far haven't felt any water seep in. The design of the upper part is pretty snug so eater doesn't drip in from the top either!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 3 pairs of Blundstones, Women's 7. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 pairs of Blundstones, Women's 7.5, 8, and 8.5, to find the correct size. These were supposed to be the middle size - 8 but OMG these were enormous. I ended up going with the largest size AUK 5.5 / 6.5 Mens / 8.5 Womens (i normally wear a 7.5) and am returning this pair and the one smaller pair. With all three side by side, i am convinced this is a fake. The quality of leather felt plasticy and the boot felt much lighter in general.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price; even better quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to replace my worn out operating room shoes as I can't quite bring myself to wear the Dansko clogs so many people love. These boots are fantastic. They do take a few days to break in--particularly the heel--but after that, they're quite comfortable. They look nice enough to wear with slacks when needed, which is a plus since I don't want to bring additional shoes to work. I've only had them a few months at this point, but the construction is holding up well and they are easy to clean. I'm definitely planning on purchasing these again once I've worn them out--however long that takes.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: These are a tough boot to buy, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We had major problems with the fit between the EUR and AUS sizes, and we'd purchased the darn things before. After three tries, we finally got it right and my husband is a happy man with his Blundstones again. He tells me these fit like a soft, supportive glove and are the best "dress" boots he's ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Hardin

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say I am not happy. These boots are made in vietnam
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of 510's for 3 years. I just picked up a new pair of 510's, and I have to say I am not happy. These boots are made in vietnam, they feel like PVC instead of leather. There is no longer a toe protector as part of the sole. These no longer have a safety toe either(required by my job). Overall I am bummed out. I have worn my first set of 510's every darn day for the past 3 years. I'm not sure these will provide me the same service. The new pair are on my feet, but I will be wearing them for a few days before I take the tags off.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems fine, but I received a mismatched pair. The left boot is a half size larger than the right. I purchased these to arrive just in time for a camping trip, so now I have to choose between wearing a mismatched pair of boots and messing up my feet, or wearing a less practical pair of shoes I already own and messing up my feet. Either way, my feet are getting messed up. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Research first but all are great quality
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of reading on the Blundstone site before shopping. The half sizes are the same length as the whole size, but the halves are a little wider. Perfect for me. I finally got the 550s because I like the leather lining that these did not have. Dress them up or dress them down. The brand is awesome, and every style is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiBeachDrew

customer_reviews.title: Good traveling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots on a 3 week trip to Iceland, Norway, and Sweden. I walked almost 50 miles in them during this time and they survived through rain, dirt, sand, and gravel. They were very comfortable and I am pleased with the purchase! Rather than giving me a blister on my calves, I built up callouses!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Durable and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of Blundstone boots. I have previously owned a lace up style and also the 550 super for farm work and general everyday wear. These particular boots, the 510 in black, are exactly what I was seeking for a pair that is durable and for everyday wear. The previous pair of lace up style blundstones fell apart after a month, at the sole. The 550’s are still with me after two and a half years.
customer_reviews.author: Leviaturtle

customer_reviews.title: Good but not made in Austrailia despite the marketing.
customer_reviews.text: With all the "Austrailia" branding on them I thought there would be a chance of them being made is Austrailia. Nope, made in china. They are very light and feel comfortable. Wider toe box then most boots. One thing; if you have custom insoles and high arches, there's a good chance they won't fit in these boots. My feet will fit with the regular insoles but the instep is too tight with my custom insoles in; for now. They should stretch out some when they break in. I can't speak of the durability but they seem to be made well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love them for many years now
customer_reviews.text: Since we visit Australia in 1999 and buying my our fisrt pair there, I keep re-buying them, if you have kind of flat feet and do not need high arch (such as keens) the Blunnies are perfect, they wear well and last a long time, mine go from everyday wear shoes in my shop/office to became yard ones once they are too "bad" looking for theoffice
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: I adore Blundstones!
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of these boots. I wear one of the two pairs 300 days a year. They have good arch support, durable and surprisingly comfortable. This pair was a bit more snug at the point where the top of my foot starts to curve to the ankle. But after a few wears the leather loosened up there and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for trail/farm walks but lacks cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Good for trail/farm walks but lacks cushion for the person who spends long days on concrete. Would go with the 550 but even those are a still a little lacking in cushion but will work if you spend less time on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: MacMals

customer_reviews.title: Someone's old boots?
customer_reviews.text: I was so grossed out when I took these boots out of the box! They had HAIR in them, lots of cut hair like a hairdresser had worn them for years and then put them in the box to send to me. So bizarre. The leather was also very worn looking which is not consistent with other brand new Blundstones that I've gotten. These are going back and I'll shop for my new Blundstones at a store!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Imse

customer_reviews.title: My daughter Loves these Boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these boots for her birthday. She has womens size 12 wide feet and these fit her well with extra room in the toes.
customer_reviews.author: MikkiQ

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been meaning to buy a pair of these for years, but put it off because of fit issues and cost. What a waste of time, these are the best boots I’ve ever owned. They end up being the only thing you wear.
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all the hype just a pair of average boots. They look fine, but no wow factor. They fit like a floppy rubber boot. Meh... I'll try Echo next time
customer_reviews.author: Nosey Bitches

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure what I was expecting for the $
customer_reviews.text: Well, I guess I should have known what to expect with a price point of $150.00. Boots looked fantastic but I could tell straight out of the box that they wouldn't hold up even worn just 2 or 3 times a week. The material felt super cheap and the construction appeared to be sub-par. Without wearing I could tell that they weren't built to last. Sorry, but I have to consider longevity over aesthetics. On to RM Williams now even though I'll have to shell out a premium.
customer_reviews.author: AI_Botfly

customer_reviews.title: Feel like the genuine article.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other Blundstones tin the past few years that were not made in Australia and seemed rubbery, not leather like. I returned those boots. These seem like the real deal or they were made in another country / outsourced and made well. I may buy another pair while they are still around. 6 months and they are holding up great in the Pacific Northwest
customer_reviews.author: suphawaii

customer_reviews.title: Blunnies are the best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I’ve ever owned. I’m pretty picky and rough on shoes. This pair is my 7th pair. I wear them 365 days a year. They wear well, and break-in is cake. If I wasn’t so hard on them, they would last longer than 2-3 years. But I’m not. Brilliant boots
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots! Can't say enough good things about them! They are so comfy, even after walking around and standing all day. These are my favorite work boots, and I've been a customer of Blundies for years.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots
customer_reviews.text: Blundstones are simply the best. Growing up is Australia I had always had a pair throughout my childhood. As an adult I still swear by them. This pair took a little breaking in. I also removed the insert that came with in favor of an insole with more arch support. This made them for like a dream- I wore them to work every day last fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough on the half sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Half sizes are supposedly wide fit. I don't think they are a true wide fit. I have wide feet and they are tight on the sides of my toes. Great boots if they fit you.
customer_reviews.author: Beeb

customer_reviews.title: Hardworking and good-looking boots.
customer_reviews.text: Gift recipient loves these boots. Says they are perfect for all kinds of activities in the city, as well as the country!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. E. Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Slip on boots
customer_reviews.text: I am in the automotive trade this type of boot is great for shop use, great fit out of the box , disappointed though there not truly made in Australia.
customer_reviews.author: tarasjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Boot and Great Casual Boot.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Blundstones for almost 30 years. I have had my brown boots for more years than I can remember. They still look great after their annual polish! They are a great work boot and a cool alternative to a Dr. Martens boot. Love them with jeans. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead1

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly. Very comfortable - ordered true to size.
customer_reviews.text: If like me you have a wide/flat/fat foot and are concerned about your foot entering comfortably - go for it! They fit perfectly and my big fat feet entered easily. Also to everyone complaining about the boots not being those of 20 years ago- blundstone and essentially every other brand thats been around 20+ years have all dipped in quality. Build a bridge and get over it because these are still quality boots.
customer_reviews.author: andre briones

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love These Boots
customer_reviews.text: Most favorite boots EVER!!! These are a replacement for the ones I wore through years ago and I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mona L

customer_reviews.title: Not the real boots
customer_reviews.text: This is not the authentic Blundstone boots. No Blundstone rag nor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H Tsao

customer_reviews.title: These are a classic!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Blundstones. Wore them a lot when I was younger and could never find them, I used to have to order from Australia. Amazon has done it again. They make it easy to get ANYTHING in the world to your door in two days. Thanks! Great boots. Form to your foot and give superior traction for any environment. Man made sole will go from hiking to the docks and everything in between. A little Nikwax (provided) and you've got some waterproof boots that go from the forest to the office.
customer_reviews.author: J. Toth

customer_reviews.title: My mom says it feels great
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable for winter weather. Great quality. My mom (I bough these shoes for her) says it looks a bit too manly but otherwise the quality is great and she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Never Mind the Naysayers
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Blundstones. I was hesitant to order them due to the multitude of comments saying that the quality has gone south since they are no longer produced in Tasmania. I'm glad that I didn't listen. I've been wearing them daily since they arrived and I couldn't be happier. They were comfortable right out of the box and have only gotten better with wear. The leather is soft, the soles seem to be good quality, and after the (very) brief break-in period they fit perfectly. Don't let the naysayers sway you; if you're thinking about getting a pair of Blundstones, do it. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Polny

customer_reviews.title: For US customers, order a 1/2 to full size larger than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.text: This boot was surprisingly small compared to a shoe only a half size larger. Needless to say, the boot was too small for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. This is perhaps my 7th pair. So durable and comfortable. I think style is nice and simple. I know people have complained about the materials being less than they were 10 or so years ago. However, I do think they perform better when worn more regularly. I know someone else pointed this out. All I can say is, they do wear out, but I really wear them a considerable amount. I work with dogs and do a fair amount of outdoor work; so as far as I'm concerned, they are durable boots.
customer_reviews.author: nikomiko

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for the very reason of working in the kitchen, I like that food doesn't get stuck on them like regular non slip shoes do, easy to clean, I'm still trying to break them in so comfort is still pending but not sure if it's the flooring at my job or the grip on those boots are not so well but so far I'm liking them especially being a person who has flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed in these boots. I’ve heard so many good things about these boots and even tried on friends pair previously but they are sooooo uncomfortable. There is no arch support and leather seems like it won’t stretch out. Will definitely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I work in an ER and usually spend 12hrs on my feet at a time. After using some inserts for arch support these things have changed my life. I've had a long list of unmentionable fluids on them and they clear right up.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: A good leather boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews and getting recommendations from friends, I bought these boots and had them shipped to Canada for our past cold winter. I wanted something that could be worn under dressier clothing, and these worked well. I thought they would break in a bit better and be a bit more comfortable, so that is why I didn't give it 5 stars. I would still recommend it though!
customer_reviews.author: Kory Mac

customer_reviews.title: Seller delivered, great boots!
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived on time and well packaged! The boots are a little bit big as I have a narrow foot but with the inserts and a thicker sock they fit better. I am very happy with my boots!
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Made in Mexico?!?!
customer_reviews.text: It is known that Blundstone has recently moved production to Thailand and India, but these say MADE IN MEXICO on the tag. The quality is vastly inferior to what I've seen from this company in the past. I have contacted Blundstone to see if they can identify these boots as authentic. The pair I received have already loose seams, shoddy leatherwork and one shoe has a slightly uneven sole. I will update this review when I hear back from Blundstone, but I'm posting now to advise anyone interested in buying Blundstone's on Amazon to shop around first and see if you can find a retailer in your area so you can see the shoes you're buying.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Daughter-in-law loved these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas present for my daughter-in-law. She was so happy with them that she put them on Christmas morning to wear on her trip to Santa Fe (leaving that afternoon).
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Loses its shape. Hurts feet.
customer_reviews.text: It starts to lose its shape over a few weeks. Doesn't feel like real leather. It kinda starts to sag. Check out my pic to see what I'm talking about. Also not meant for walking. U definitely need in-souls or else ur feet will hurt.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable boots I own, and a low maintenance leather boot as well! Great value for what you pay. Would buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: devin kinsey

customer_reviews.title: High quality, stylish and water tight!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best everyday boots you could opt for. Great for muddy outdoor activity but stylish enough for city slicking (whatever that means). They are perfect with jeans and the sole is very shock absorbent for high impact pavement trekking. Oh and go ahead and stomp in puddles with your kids. They come with leather sealant that will make them watertight!
customer_reviews.author: Boston Audiophile

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift, and they were well received. Expected fit, nice style, good delivery. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: OptimistPrime

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Blundstones after meaning to try them for years. Flat out live them from day one. As comfortable as any slippers I’ve owned with no break-in time required. The build quality is evident. Already thinking of getting a brown pair!
customer_reviews.author: Seamus O2L

customer_reviews.title: Just right size
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 9/5 I went ahead and went with a size 10 there perfect size for me with heavy wool socks on.
customer_reviews.author: egan

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! They took about week to break in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! They took about week to break in but they are super comfortable and stylish. I usually wear a 9.5 US, but the size recommended was a 7.5 US and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GRB

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is appalling. Go with the recommendations. ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is appalling. Go with the recommendations. It is fairly accurate. I’m a US size 9.5-10, but an Australian 10.5 fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best everyday boot on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Blundstone boots. I've loved my first two, and had each pair for several years. I'm getting my second pair re-soled, and my first pair were damaged beyond repair otherwise I would still have them too. I love the look, and wear them to work everyday with khakis and on the weekends with jeans. This pair is tighter than my previous pair, still fit and comfortable, just a much snugger fit, which I attribute to more than just having to break them in. Great look, great comfort and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Blundstone 510 Slip On Boot
customer_reviews.text: Wow! to anyone unfamiliar with Blundstone quality or brandname...try a pair. YOU won't be disappointed. Clever slide on...and no laces. Half a size is easily eaten up with thick socks or an extra insole. The elastics will NOT wear out! Great boot. The more used and beaten up it gets...the better it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Duffy

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I wear an 81/2 or 9 in women's shoes. My feet are a tad on the wide side. I ordered an 6.5 in these, as the .5 means wide (from what I read). I feel like a 5.5 would fit as well, but nonetheless the 6.5 are OK, a little loose, but I can still wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: MiraJaneSheDevil

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I wore these all weekend building a 10x20 ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wore these all weekend building a 10x20 carport. Working in the rain I was standing in mud and my feet were nice and dry and the boot didn't need any break in time.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: May be the best Boot I ever had. Works perfect for every day as well as for tracks and trips we take. It seems the more I wear it the more comfortable it gets.
customer_reviews.author: YogikTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: For all the bulbous toed shoe lovers out there
customer_reviews.text: I almost liked them. If only the toe were a little less bulbous, they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Best boot I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of boots I’ve ever bought! This is my second pair and I’ve literally lived in these things. Work, social life, and even outdoor. Love love love. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great great great
customer_reviews.text: Great great great. Blundstone is akin to Dr. Martens of the UK, Danner of the USA, etc. A classic and well respected Australian brand. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam_S

customer_reviews.title: Had to return these Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Boots to replace my old 10 1/2 Austrailian = 11 1/2 US boots only to find that the new exact same size pair are now much smaller and unwearable. No, my feet have not changed size. Whatever has happened between how they sized them some years ago and today seems quite different. I love my old Blundstone's and am quite irritated that I'll have go to a store now to get a properly fitting pair. I am returning these Boots. Peter B
customer_reviews.author: peter barbera

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them already
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these boots! The left one was a little tight but after a couple of wears they are broken in and feel amazing. I wear them almost everyday
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Stepp-Davis

customer_reviews.title: The real thing?
customer_reviews.text: I owned a pair of these a long time ago and was amazed at the comfort and quality. Either Blundstone has gone downhill or these aren’t the real thing. Stiff leather, uncomfortable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I decided to give them a try because they looked durable but nice. These boots are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I live in upstate new york where it is winter 8/12 months and I have to walk uphill in the snow and ice. After seeing a ton of Israel in these boots, I decided to give them a try because they looked durable but nice.These boots are AMAZING. Waterproof, great grip, comfortable, but still look nice. I expect to own and love these for several years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Hard to size properly
customer_reviews.text: The unisex sizing was a bit of a challenge. I needed to order 1/2 size larger. The return process was super easy. The boots are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Angela Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Best boots Ever !!
customer_reviews.text: Best boots ever just they are not True fit , Should buy 1/2 size smaller . Anyway that out the way ;these are the best boots u have ever had !!
customer_reviews.author: Moonboy

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Well they said it was going to fit a size us 14. What they didn't let me know is that I wouldn't be able to wear socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot!
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first pair on Blunies! They are the most comfortable light weight boot I've ever worn!! Good for all conditions!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennydrums

customer_reviews.title: Wife and daughter each have a pair and love them. Daughter's pair are at least one year ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife and daughter each have a pair and love them. Daughter's pair are at least one year old and holding up well considering she is in college in lots of cold weather and snow.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: best boots
customer_reviews.text: love them, so comfy but definitely size up .5 or whole size!
customer_reviews.author: solhall

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to size down
customer_reviews.text: Normally a US Women's size 9.5-10 and ordered these shoes in a size equivalent to a US Woemn's size 9, fit me perfectly. Would recommend to size down. Fit well, great quality, lots of compliments and I love them so far. Thought they would be heavier as I've never owned a pair before, very light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall impressed with this boot.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fireman and I work 24 hour shifts. I cant wear them that long because I put a new sole in them for better cushion and they are a little snug on my feet. They come on and off pretty fast but you cant get a finger in the loops. You have to grab it in the back of the boot to put it on for speed. I've had them for a year now and they still look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: snapper23

customer_reviews.title: like candy!!!
customer_reviews.text: best boot money can buy!!! well this kind of money! fits like a glove but without fingers! one pair of boots that will last almost, just short of forever. this is my 3rd bluntie and i want more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: grippla kukalapiTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price, comfortable and they wear like Iron.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work everyday! After 4 years the soles are worn but they are still holding up. Will definitely buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Hedgehog In K36

customer_reviews.title: This is my first pair of shoes from this manufacturer ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of shoes from this manufacturer. They were exactly what I was looking for. They are almost dressy enough to wear around the office and once I apply the provided Nikwax to the almost one piece leather construction they'll be waterproof. I ordered size 9AU. They were a little roomy but I swapped out the included insoles with some made by Superfeet and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: I followed advice from other reviews. I ordered a full size bigger than I normally wear in other slip on boots. The fit is perfect. Take a while to break in.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best everyday boot - but now made in Thailand
customer_reviews.text: i've worn blunnies for nearly 20 years. they seem to average 5 years a pair or so - and i'm talking wearing every day, or close to it. i was surprised and somewhat disheartened when my last pair arrived and i noticed that they were made in thailand instead of australia as my previous pairs were - and the cost had remained the same. so i was pretty skeptical and was prepared to be disappointed. however, that pair has lasted for five years, just as my aussie-made boots did, so i really have no complaints. and i've just ordered another pair to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: bscepter

customer_reviews.title: Maybe more like 3/4 size difference between AU and US
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually 11.5 or 12 US so I ordered the 10.5 AU which felt fine standing inside at home, so I wore them to work next day, and all the walking made it clear there wasn't room for my big toe and little toe in the toe-box of the left boot! Three 1/2 day attempts to break them in and I gave up - they're going to ARC, and maybe I'll try 11 AU
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hannifin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: After wearing Dr Martens for a couple winters, these feel like walking on clouds. So comfy, cute with dresses and bare legs in warmer weather, just really versatile. They look really cool, the leather has not scuffed yet, the toe shape is perfect, they're my favorite flat boots. I live in Montreal where the winter is really intense and I don't have a car but they have yet to get water in them after one winter.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than prior versions of the same boot
customer_reviews.text: i heard reviews that the new factory produced a different version than the tasmania plant. I totally agree they fit completely different. I've bought at least 5 pairs and they all felt great the day I put them on. This most recent pair feels about 1 size smaller and I have extreme pain after about 3 hrs of wearing them. The quality, materials and workmanship seem the same but I will need to pay to have these stretched if I ever plan to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Peschel

customer_reviews.title: Best boots for a city slicker
customer_reviews.text: Best boots my son has ever owned! Comfortable and waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Good fit
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit OK. Not quite as comfy as other Blundstones according to recipient. But they do the job in winter...look nice and are a good buy. I'm not the most knowledgeable about Blundstones, these to me looked sorta plain. Good basic boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit! So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots I have ever purchased. I had a pair of Blundstone Original boots that lasted for 3-4 years. I am still wearing them, but needed a nice pair for showing horses to clients. Extremely comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes! definitely buying another pair at some point
customer_reviews.author: gyasi Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot and fits well.  very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot. It fits well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Richard

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sturdy construction. The boot was too large for me (Mens 8.5 is my normal size), but since I was going to put in insoles anyway, I kept the boots and the fit well now with the insoles added on top of the normal boot insole (which was very thin).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ness

customer_reviews.title: Best boots you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best boots you can buy. I wear mine 4 days a week as an airline pilot. My first pair lasted 7 years..... Just bought my third pair. Been wearing them for 13 plus years. When broken in, they feel as comfortable as slippers. they come with a flat black finish, but a shoe shine at the airport every 3 months of so and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Graf

customer_reviews.title: I love Blundstone boots
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced my black Blundstone boots and they were just as comfortable and attractive as the last pair. Summer and winter I wear either my black boots or brown ones almost every day because they are so comfortable and always look good. The soles do eventually crack and breakdown, but after years of daily use, I can't complain. I think they are good value and the only footwear I want or need.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Blunnies are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Blunnies are the best. This is my third pair in 15+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Debber

customer_reviews.title: durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love my boots- nice for wide feet, study- my second pair, so now I have a beater pair and a good pair to last for years :)
customer_reviews.author: Michele Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Wore them straight out of the box. Comfortable for wide feet. I wear a 61/2 wide. Hiked 5 national parks in them but can also wear them around town!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot made to last
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Blundstone, once they break in you’ll have them for years to come with proper care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: As if you didn't already know, these are the best boots you will ever buy. My 3rd pair, and never disappoints
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot. On my feet 10-15 hrs a day. 5-7 days a week. On every footing imaginable. In all temps. I have a fused spine and replace this shoe every 1.5 yr.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Flores

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots. But go try them on to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots. But go try them on to fit in person. I usually wear a 8.5 but boots fit differently that sneakers. But once I found my "Blundstone" size...this is the only boot I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Chien

customer_reviews.title: Blundstone 510
customer_reviews.text: The boots are exactly what I was looking for and expected! The only bad thing is it takes a wear or two to get used to them!!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! My second pair! I always size down a 1/2 size. I’m usually an 8 1/2, but with Blundstones I’m an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Mora

product_meta.title: Blundstone 510
product_meta.description:
Bei den Farmern Australiens seit über 100 Jahren sehr beliebt ist dieser klassische Workerboot von BLUNDSTONE. Er schützt und stützt den Fuß optimal bei harter Arbeit. Inzwischen ist der bequeme und robuste Boot auch außerhalb von 'Down Under' aus dem Stadtbild nicht mehr wegzudenken. Aus wasserabweisendem Leder mit Elastikeinsatz. Bequemes Fußbett; leichte, rutschfeste Gummisohle mit 'Shock Protection System', dadurch extrem gelenkschonend.
o Material: Rindsleder
o Beidseitig elastische Einsätze
o Innenmaterial: Leder
o Textile Innensohle, herausnehmbar
o Gummilaufsohle stark profiliert


Pflegehinweise: Leder reinigen: Entfernen Sie zuerst alle verkrusteten Verschmutzungen an Ihren Stiefeln mit einer weichen Borstenbürste oder einem feuchten Tuch und lassen Sie Ihre Stiefel an der Luft trocknen. Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass Ihre Stiefel nicht direktem Sonnenlicht oder Heizungen ausgesetzt sind, da sie das Leder austrocknen. Tragen Sie Lederpolitur, Spray oder Creme auf das Leder auf, um Ihre Stiefel zu pflegen. Wenn Sie zum ersten Mal eine Politur verwenden, versuchen Sie es an einer unauffälligen Stelle des Schuhs, um zu prüfen, ob sich Farbe oder Aussehen ändern. Wenn Sie eine Politur verwenden, tragen Sie eine kleine Menge Lederreiniger auf ein Poliertuch oder eine Bürste auf und reiben Sie den Schuh in kreisförmigen Bewegungen ein. Wischen Sie den Rückstand weg und lassen Sie ihn wieder trocknen.

Hinweis: Blundstone-Stiefel sind mit australischen Größen markiert. Bitte beachten Sie, dass sich unsere ½-Größen auf die Breite und nicht auf die Länge beziehen. Die australische Herrengröße entspricht der in Großbritannien. Die australische Größe von Frauen ist eine geringere Größe als in Großbritannien.



Blundstone's adult 510 slip-on boot is an everyday casual work shoe you'll get miles of wear in. Featuring 2.5-millimeter-thick weather-proof leather, a well-designed shock protection system that reduces shock by 33 percent, and a removable Cambrelle footbed that wicks moisture away, this work boot is designed as much for comfort as for dependability. It also includes an injection-molded dual density polyurethane outsole for a softer step. This high-quality ankle work boot also has flexible elastic panels and finger loops at the top of the shoe for easy slip-on and removal.

Blundstone has been making sturdy and unique boots in Tasmania, Australia, since 1870. The family-owned company has maintained the quality, integrity and authenticity of their products for over 130 years. Blundstone boots are no-nonsense, go-anywhere, do

See more
feature_bullets: Weather-proof leather 2.5mm thick with Shock protection system (SPS)
The size on the shoe is the AU Size, Please refer to the size chart for conversion

Anatomical design, removable Cambrelle comfort footbed wicks moisture away, SPS (Shock Prevention System) reduces shock by 33%, upper is seamlessly fused to PU outsole, dual density outsole for softer walk
The sizes available in drop down are for US Men's, refer sizing chart for Women's
